ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( Management_Fee__c, OR( Acquisition_Cust_Group_Anchor__c, Acquisition_Cust_Group_Residential__c, Acquisition_Sizing_Type_Downsizing__c, Acquisition_Sizing_Type_Upsizing__c, Acquisition_Channels_BCS_Acquired__c, Acquisition_Channels_Non_BCS_Acquired__c ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: If this is an management fee, do not populate acquisition fee fields
